title: EXODUS Recruits DEATH ANGEL's MARK OSEGUEDA For A Killer SCORPIONS Cover
description: "He's A Woman, She's A Man" is the track. The post EXODUS Recruits DEATH ANGEL's MARK OSEGUEDA For A Killer SCORPIONS Cover appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 33 minutes ago
excerpt: "He's A Woman, She's A Man" is the track.
text: Exodus has teamed up with vocalist Mark Osegueda (Death Angel, Kerry King) for a cover of Scorpions' 1977 track "He's A Woman – She's A Man" from their Taken By Force record. "We decided to cover one of our favorite bands of all time a ways back and have been sitting on it until now, and even better, the one and only Mark Osegueda of Death Angel/Kerry King collabed with us to sing it, and he crushes it!" said Exodus guitarist Gary Holt. "He is the only guy we knew who could do Klaus justice. Hope you dig it!" Exodus will hit the road on April 27 at the Nile in Phoenix, AZ with Havok and Misfire, and wraps up on May 17 at Milwaukee Metal Fest in Milwaukee, WI. html:
Exodus has teamed up with vocalist Mark Osegueda (Death Angel, Kerry King) for a cover of Scorpions' 1977 track "He's A Woman – She's A Man" from their Taken By Force record.

"We decided to cover one of our favorite bands of all time a ways back and have been sitting on it until now, and even better, the one and only Mark Osegueda of Death Angel/Kerry King collabed with us to sing it, and he crushes it!" said Exodus guitarist Gary Holt. "He is the only guy we knew who could do Klaus justice. Hope you dig it!"

Exodus will hit the road on April 27 at the Nile in Phoenix, AZ with Havok and Misfire, and wraps up on May 17 at Milwaukee Metal Fest in Milwaukee, WI. Tickets are available here.
